mapper.sql: id AS "id" , user_code AS "userCode" , mobile_number AS "mobileNumber" , bsi_cash_coupon_code AS "bsiCashCouponCode" , bsi_cash_coupon_name AS "bsiCashCouponName" , bsi_cash_coupon_create_date AS "bsiCashCouponCreateDate" , bsi_cash_coupon_invalid_date AS "bsiCashCouponInvalidDate" , bsi_cash_coupon_status AS "bsiCashCouponStatus" , bsi_cash_coupon_type AS "bsiCashCouponType" , bsi_cash_coupon_period AS "bsiCashCouponPeriod" , order_code AS "orderCode" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, user_code = #{userCode}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber}, bsi_cash_coupon_code = #{bsiCashCouponCode}, bsi_cash_coupon_name = #{bsiCashCouponName}, bsi_cash_coupon_create_date = #{bsiCashCouponCreateDate}, bsi_cash_coupon_invalid_date = #{bsiCashCouponInvalidDate}, bsi_cash_coupon_status = #{bsiCashCouponStatus}, bsi_cash_coupon_type = #{bsiCashCouponType}, bsi_cash_coupon_period = #{bsiCashCouponPeriod}, order_code = #{orderCode}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_svp_bsi_cash_coupon ( id, user_code, mobile_number, bsi_cash_coupon_code, bsi_cash_coupon_name, bsi_cash_coupon_create_date, bsi_cash_coupon_invalid_date, bsi_cash_coupon_status, bsi_cash_coupon_type, bsi_cash_coupon_period, order_code, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userCode}, #{mobileNumber}, #{bsiCashCouponCode}, #{bsiCashCouponName}, #{bsiCashCouponCreateDate}, #{bsiCashCouponInvalidDate}, #{bsiCashCouponStatus}, #{bsiCashCouponType}, #{bsiCashCouponPeriod}, #{orderCode}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate} )
